title: The Tarnished Gate
premise: A disgraced trauma surgeon, fleeing a malpractice lawsuit, stumbles through a portal into a dying world that worships him as a prophesied healer. To survive and earn a chance to return home, he must perform impossible, magical surgeries—but the 'medical miracles' this world needs require harvesting life essence from its innocent inhabitants. His quest for redemption in one world may damn him in another.
conflict: Silas must choose between using the world's brutal, soul-based magic to heal the land and secure his passage home, or upholding his oath to do no harm while being hunted as a false prophet by the very people he refuses to save.
setting: Modern-day Boston and the decaying, bioluminescent realm of Lumen, where magic is fueled by stolen vitality and geography shifts with the collective pain of its people.
tone: Grim, clinical, and morally fraught, blending surgical precision with dark fantasy horror.
